DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy of decitabine and identify predictors for response to decitabine therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Response During the Second Cycle of Decitabine Can Predict Response and Survival for Myelodysplastic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: - Histologically confirmed Myelodysplastic syndrome Diagnosed with MDS (de novo or secondary) based on the World Health Organization (WHO) classifications - Survival and response Analysis - Response rate - Overall survival - Leukemia free survival
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed Myelodysplastic syndrome Diagnosed with MDS (de novo or secondary) based on the World Health Organization (WHO) classifications
